rulesStrings.li: r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==sanguine)->[INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already, I'm sure of it — [optimist_comment].
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->I'm quite sure [INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already — [optimist_comment].
optimist_comment(INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust,priority=1)->it will be glorious watching your people being butchered and tortured!
optimist_comment->so I need you to release me. This way, we can avoid unnecessary bloodshed among your people.
chemical1->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug1]...
chemical1->Please give me some [drug1]; I'll promise to cooperate more... I just need a fix, that's all.
chemical0->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug0]...
chemical0->Please give me some [drug0]; I'll promise to cooperate more.
good_opinion->I'll consider it... but give me more time to think, okay?
good_opinion->I need more time to recollect my thoughts...

r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->I'm quite sure [INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already — [optimist_comment].

optimist_comment->so I need you to release me. This way, we can avoid unnecessary bloodshed among your people.

chemical1->Please give me some [drug1]; I'll promise to cooperate more... I just need a fix, that's all.
chemical0->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug0]...
chemical0->Please give me some [drug0]; I'll promise to cooperate more.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_higherPassion==shooting)->During a fight, I enjoy shooting from a distance.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_higherPassion==melee,INITIATOR_trait==brawler,priority=1)->During a fight, I enjoy using punches and kicks.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_higherPassion==melee)->During a fight, I enjoy using melee weapons.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_higherPassion==medical)->I love taking care of other people!
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==sanguine)->[INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already, I'm sure of it — [optimist_comment].
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->I'm quite sure [INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already — [optimist_comment].

optimist_comment->so I need you to release me. This way, we can avoid unnecessary bloodshed among your people.

chemical1->Please give me some [drug1]; I'll promise to cooperate more... I just need a fix, that's all.
chemical0->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug0]...
chemical0->Please give me some [drug0]; I'll promise to cooperate more.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_bestSkill==animals)->I'm best skilled at taking care of animals.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_bestSkill==medical)->I'm best skilled at taking care of other people.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_bestSkill==social)->I'm best skilled at being around people.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_bestSkill==intellectual)->I'm best skilled at logic and reasoning.
bad_opinion->I hate to say this, but... you finally convinced me to join your filthy community.
good_opinion->I'm ready to be part of [RECIPIENT_factionName].
part2->I'd be a fool to join [RECIPIENT_factionName]!
part2->I'm sure my friends back at [INITIATOR_factionName] are sending a rescue party as we speak!
part2(INITIATOR_opinion<=-25)->I'd never join a community that accepts lousy people like you!
aggressive->I'd rather die than join your lousy [faction]!
aggressive->I'd rather die than join a [faction] full of scum!
aggressive->[RECIPIENT_factionName]'s rescue party is on its way and will kill you all!
part2->I don't want to join; I want to go back home!
part2(INITIATOR_thoughtDefName==NeedFood)->I'm starving here, and you want me to join you?! Get lost!
good_opinion->No — I'd rather go back to my community.
good_opinion->No — I'll be better off with [INITIATOR_factionName].
good_opinion->I'm a loyal member of [INITIATOR_factionName] — I won't join your [faction].
good_opinion(INITIATOR_opinion>=25)->Nothing personal, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] — but I won't join your [faction].
good_opinion(INITIATOR_thoughtDefName==NeedFood)->I'd rather be with my community — they wouldn't let me starve...
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==sanguine)->[INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already, I'm sure of it — [optimist_comment].
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->I'm quite sure [INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already — [optimist_comment].
optimist_comment(INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust,priority=1)->it will be glorious watching your people being butchered and tortured!
optimist_comment->so I need you to release me. This way, we can avoid unnecessary bloodshed among your people.
chemical1->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug1]...
chemical1->Please [bring] me some [drug1]; I'll promise to cooperate more... I just need a fix, that's all.
chemical0->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug0]...
chemical0->Please [bring] me some [drug0]; I'll promise to cooperate more.
environmentdark(INITIATOR_trait==night owl,priority=2)->Don't set up any lights here — I feel more comfortable in darkness.
environmentdark(INITIATOR_trait==undergrounder,priority=1)->Darkness feels like home to me — but even so, I'd like to have some light here.
environmentdark->I'd like to have some light in here — it's too dark.
needfood(INITIATOR_trait==gourmand)-> — and I hope it will be prepared by a professional chef.
needfood(INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)-> — whatever meal you have, even raw food, is fine by me.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->I need to slit your throat and drink your hot blood.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==masochist)->Punch me, kick me until I faint — I deserve it...
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->My only desire is getting out of here so I can live the simple life I wish for myself.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==gourmand)->My stomach doesn't agree with low-quality food, so make sure I get properly cooked meals.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==pyromaniac)->I'd like this room to have lit torches on the walls.
psy_bad_opinion->What!? Your psychic readings are completely fake...
psy_good_opinion->Yes — your psychic readings are correct.
bad_opinion->Are you trying to scare me with your [sorcery]?
good_opinion->What... what are you speaking about?
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==sanguine)->[INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already, I'm sure of it — [optimist_comment]
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->I'm quite sure [INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already — [optimist_comment]
optimist_comment(INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust,priority=1)->it will be glorious watching your people being butchered and tortured!
optimist_comment->so I need you to release me. This way, we can avoid unnecessary bloodshed among your people.
chemical1->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug1]...
chemical1->Please give me some [drug1]; I'll promise to cooperate more... I just need a fix, that's all.
chemical0->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug0]...
chemical0->Please give me some [drug0]; I'll promise to cooperate more.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->I love torturing people while watching their blood pooling around them.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==kind)->I believe much can be achieved with sincere smiles and kind words.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==nimble)->I'm quite agile and can dodge melee blows with ease.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==fast learner)->I'm an adaptive person — meaning that I can learn very quickly!
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==slow learner)->I like taking things slow, so I tend to need more time to learn new things.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==body modder)->I think our bodies are feeble and need bio-enhancements.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==body purist)->I believe our bodies are limited for a reason — bio-enhancements are disgusting and unethical.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==night owl)->I like to work at night.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==greedy)->I deserve only the best in my life — I won't accept lower standards.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==jealous)->I never accept being given scraps when there's gold around — I am the one who deserves the best!
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->I enjoy the simple things of life and have no materialistic desires.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==asexual)->I'm happily free from the sex drives that enslave most of our lives.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==misandrist)->I firmly believe that men are all cruel and untrustworthy.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==misogynist)->I firmly believe that women are all cruel and untrustworthy.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==great memory)->I have a fantastic memory for detail.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==tough)->I have thick skin, dense flesh and durable bones — killing me is no easy task.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==gourmand)->Haute cuisine is one of my passions — I enjoy fancy meals!
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==quick sleeper)->I tend to need less sleep than the average person.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==tortured artist)->Nobody understands my creative energies, but I do have a great artistic potential...
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==teetotaler)->I abhor the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals or alcoholic beverages.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==industrious)->I have an easy time staying on-task and focused — I get things done much faster than the average person.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==hard worker)->I am a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==slothful)->I just love sleeping, eating, relaxing and taking it easy — that's my ideal way of life.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==sanguine)->No matter what it, I'm naturally upbeat about my situation — pretty much all the time.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->I'm naturally optimistic about life — it's hard to get me down.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==pessimist)->The proverbial glass is always half empty for me.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==depressive)->Happiness is just a fickle illusion in our wretched lives...
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==iron-willed)->My will is an iron shield — I keep going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==steadfast)->I'm mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==nervous)->I tend to crack under pressure...
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==volatile)->I have mood swings sometimes — I'm the first to break in any tough situation.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==neurotic)->I like to have things squared away — I will work harder than most to reach my aims, even if this could mean endagering my mental health.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==very neurotic)->Things must be squared away — it's the only correct way to get work done. I will work hard to reach my aims, whatever the price.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==super-immune)->I have a naturally powerful immune system — I can survive illnesses that would kill others.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_trait==sickly)->I have an awful immune system, so unfortunately I get sick more often than usual.
good_opinion(priority=-1)->There's nothing special about me, really...
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==sanguine)->[INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already, I'm sure of it — [optimist_comment].
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->I'm quite sure [INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already — [optimist_comment].
optimist_comment(INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust,priority=1)->it will be glorious watching your people being butchered and tortured!
optimist_comment->so I need you to release me. This way, we can avoid unnecessary bloodshed among your people.
chemical1->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug1]...
chemical1->Please give me some [drug1]; I'll promise to cooperate more... I just need a fix, that's all.
chemical0->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug0]...
chemical0->Please give me some [drug0]; I'll promise to cooperate more.
good_opinion(INITIATOR_thoughtDefName==ClothedNudist,priority=1)->Actually, I'd feel more at ease without these constraining clothes...
good_opinion(INITIATOR_thoughtDefName==HappyNude,priority=1)->I'm perfectly fine — I don't need any clothes.
good_opinion(priority=-1)->Thanks — I'm fine with what I'm wearing right now.
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==sanguine)->[INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already, I'm sure of it — [optimist_comment].
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->I'm quite sure [INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already — [optimist_comment].
optimist_comment(INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust,priority=1)->it will be glorious watching your people being butchered and tortured!
optimist_comment->so I need you to release me. This way, we can avoid unnecessary bloodshed among your people.
chemical1->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug1]...
chemical1->Please give me some [drug1]; I'll promise to cooperate more... I just need a fix, that's all.
chemical0->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug0]...
chemical0->Please give me some [drug0]; I'll promise to cooperate more.
melee_master(INITIATOR_melee_passion==Minor)->Close combat has always been my preferred style — a style I now completely master.
melee_master(INITIATOR_melee_passion==Major)->I love being close up with my enemy — this is why I've easily mastered all melee arts.
melee_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->My masterful and devastating onslaughts let me drink as much of my enemies' blood as I wish!
melee_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==brawler)->When I get close up with my enemies, I easily smash their face.
melee_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==nimble)->I tire my melee opponents by dodging their blows — and then I masterfully hit their weak spots.
melee_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==tough)->I know how to best withstand my opponents' blows — and how to masterfully hit their weak spots.
melee_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==wimp)->Even though I clearly am a masterful melee fighter, I can't endure long fights.
melee_veteran(INITIATOR_melee_passion==Minor)->Close combat has always been my preferred style — a style that lead me to many victories.
melee_veteran(INITIATOR_melee_passion==Major)->I love being close up with my enemy — and I'm quite skilled at this.
melee_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->I love bathing my bare hands in my enemies' blood — and my melee skills gave me this pleasure many times!
melee_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==brawler)->If I manage to get close up with my enemies, I can skillfully cut them down.
melee_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==nimble)->I tire my melee opponents by dodging their blows — and then I aim at their weak spots.
melee_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==tough)->I'm skilled at enduring my opponents' blows — and then striking back at their weak spots.
melee_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==wimp)->Even though I clearly am a veteran melee fighter, I can't withstand long fights.
melee_green(INITIATOR_melee_passion==Minor)->Close combat has always been my preferred style — I still have to hone my skills, though.
melee_green(INITIATOR_melee_passion==Major)->I love being close up with my enemy — I still have lots to learn, though.
melee_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->I'd love to get more close combat practice — and get more chances to watch my enemies as they choke in their own blood!
melee_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==brawler)->I prefer close combat, but I still need some practice to get good at it.
melee_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==nimble)->I tire my opponents by dodging their blows — and then I try to aim at their weak spots.
melee_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==tough)->My thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones let me endure many blows — but my melee skills aren't that good.
melee_green(priority=-1)->I can handle close combat weapons.
melee_unskilled(INITIATOR_melee_passion==Minor)->I like being in close combat, but I still need a lot of practice.
melee_unskilled(INITIATOR_melee_passion==Major)->I love being close up with my enemy — but I have almost no melee experience...
melee_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->I'd love to get lots of close combat practice — and get more chances to watch my enemies as they choke in their own blood!
melee_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==brawler)->I prefer close combat, but I still need lots of practice to get good at it.
melee_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==nimble)->I hope to tire my melee opponents by dodging their blows...
melee_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==tough)->My thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones let me endure many blows — but that's all.
melee_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==wimp)->I always avoid violence — I can't endure pain!
melee_unskilled(priority=-1)->I have no experience whatsoever in close combat fighting.
melee_unskilled(priority=-1)->I have no close combat skills.
shooting_master(INITIATOR_shooting_passion==Minor)->Ranged combat has always been my preferred style — a style I now completely master.
shooting_master(INITIATOR_shooting_passion==Major)->I love shooting at my enemy from a distance — this is why I've easily mastered all ranged arts.
shooting_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->After my first shot, my enemy is choking in a pool of his own blood — a sight I cherish and love!
shooting_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==brawler)->I'm extremely good at ranged combat, but I totally hate it — I prefer melee combat!
shooting_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==tough)->Even if I get shot, I'm still perfectly capable of masterfully hitting my enemies' weak spots.
shooting_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==wimp)->Even though I clearly am a masterful marksman, I can't endure long fights.
shooting_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==careful shooter)->I believe a skilled marksman must aim long before taking a shot — that's what I am, that's what I do.
shooting_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==trigger-happy)->I can spray and pray — and still hit all the targets.
shooting_veteran(INITIATOR_shooting_passion==Minor)->Ranged combat has always been my preferred style — a style that lead me to many victories.
shooting_veteran(INITIATOR_shooting_passion==Major)->I love shooting at my enemy from a distance — and I'm quite skilled at this.
shooting_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->I love watching my enemies' blood as it splashes everywhere — and my ranged skills gave me this pleasure many times!
shooting_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==brawler)->I had to learn how to use ranged weapons, but I hate them — I prefer melee combat!
shooting_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==tough)->Even if I get shot, I endure the pain and shoot back at my enemies.
shooting_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==wimp)->Even though I clearly am a veteran marksman, I can't endure long fights.
shooting_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==careful shooter)->I aim long before taking a shot — that's what makes me a pro shooter.
shooting_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==trigger-happy)->I can spray and pray — and still hit most of the targets.
shooting_green(INITIATOR_shooting_passion==Minor)->Ranged combat has always been my preferred style — I still have to hone my skills, though.
shooting_green(INITIATOR_shooting_passion==Major)->I love shooting at my enemy from a distance — I still have lots to learn, though.
shooting_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->I'd love to get more ranged combat practice — and get more chances to watch my enemies as they choke in their own blood!
shooting_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==brawler)->I have some ranged combat skills, but I hate it — I prefer melee combat!
shooting_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==tough)->My thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones let me endure many shots — but my shooting skills aren't that good.
shooting_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==careful shooter)->I aim long before taking a shot — that's what helps me hit my targets.
shooting_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==trigger-happy)->I spray and pray — I might miss some targets, but it gets the job done.
shooting_unskilled(INITIATOR_shooting_passion==Minor)->I prefer shooting at my enemy from a distance, but I still need a lot of practice.
shooting_unskilled(INITIATOR_shooting_passion==Major)->I love shooting at my enemy from a distance — but I have almost no shooting experience...
shooting_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust)->I'd love to get lots of ranged combat practice — and get more chances to watch my enemies as they choke in their own blood!
shooting_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==brawler)->I'm totally useless with ranged weapons — I prefer fighting up close and personal.
shooting_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==tough)->My thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones let me endure many shots — but that's all.
shooting_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==wimp)->I always avoid violence — I can't endure pain!
shooting_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==careful shooter)->I aim long before taking a shot — that's the only way I can hope to hit my targets.
shooting_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==trigger-happy)->I just close my eyes and shoot as much as I can — it's the best I can do.
shooting_unskilled(priority=-1)->I have no experience whatsoever in ranged combat.
shooting_unskilled(priority=-1)->I have no ranged combat skills.
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==sanguine)->[INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already, I'm sure of it — [optimist_comment].
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->I'm quite sure [INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already — [optimist_comment].
optimist_comment(INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust,priority=1)->it will be glorious watching your people being butchered and tortured!
optimist_comment->so I need you to release me. This way, we can avoid unnecessary bloodshed among your people.
chemical1->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug1]...
chemical1->Please give me some [drug1]; I'll promise to cooperate more... I just need a fix, that's all.
chemical0->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug0]...
chemical0->Please give me some [drug0]; I'll promise to cooperate more.
construction_master(INITIATOR_construction_passion==Minor)->I enjoy building structures — and the ones I build are usually pretty impressive.
construction_master(INITIATOR_construction_passion==Major)->I just love building structures — and the ones I build are usually pretty impressive.
construction_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->When tasked by someone else, I can easily build structures of the greatest beauty and efficiency — yet, for myself, I prefer simpler things.
construction_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==greedy)->I am one of the few who can build structures of unsurpassed beauty and efficiency — and this is why I deserve them for myself.
construction_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==jealous)->I am one of the few who can build structures of unsurpassed beauty and efficiency — and this is why nobody else should have them but me.
construction_master(priority=-1)->Not to brag but I've achieved the highest skill levels in [performing] construction tasks.
construction_veteran(INITIATOR_construction_passion==Minor)->I enjoy building structures — and the ones I build are usually impressive.
construction_veteran(INITIATOR_construction_passion==Major)->I just love building structures — and the ones I build are usually impressive.
construction_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->When tasked by someone else, I can easily build quite beautiful and efficient structures — yet, for myself, I prefer simpler things.
construction_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==greedy)->Only few can build structures of great beauty and efficiency like I do — and this is why I think I deserve them for myself.
construction_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==jealous)->Only few can build structures of great beauty and efficiency like I do — and this is why nobody else should have them but me.
construction_veteran(priority=-1)->Not to brag but I've achieved very high skill levels in [performing] construction tasks.
construction_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->I can build decent structures — that, by the way, are the ones I prefer for myself.
construction_green(priority=-1)->I have some skills in [performing] construction tasks.
construction_unskilled(INITIATOR_construction_passion==Minor)->I enjoy building structures, but I still have a lot to learn.
construction_unskilled(INITIATOR_construction_passion==Major)->I just love building structures, but I still have a lot to learn.
construction_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==ascetic)->I have all the construction skills I need to build the things as I like them — plain and simple.
construction_unskilled(priority=-1)->I have no skills in [performing] construction tasks.
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==sanguine)->[INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already, I'm sure of it — [optimist_comment].
r_logentry(INITIATOR_trait==optimist)->I'm quite sure [INITIATOR_factionName] sent a rescue party already — [optimist_comment].
optimist_comment(INITIATOR_trait==bloodlust,priority=1)->it will be glorious watching your people being butchered and tortured!
optimist_comment->so I need you to release me. This way, we can avoid unnecessary bloodshed among your people.
chemical1->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug1]...
chemical1->Please give me some [drug1]; I'll promise to cooperate more... I just need a fix, that's all.
chemical0->I'll be willing to cooperate more if you [bring] me some [drug0]...
chemical0->Please give me some [drug0]; I'll promise to cooperate more.
mining_master(INITIATOR_mining_passion==Minor)->I enjoy mining — and my yields are extremely high and valuable.
mining_master(INITIATOR_mining_passion==Major)->I just love mining — and my yields are extremely high and valuable.
mining_master(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==undergrounder)->My mining yields are extremely high and valuable, especially when deep mining.
mining_master(priority=-1)->Not to brag but I've achieved the highest skill levels in [performing] mining tasks.
mining_veteran(INITIATOR_mining_passion==Minor)->I enjoy mining — and my yields are quite high.
mining_veteran(INITIATOR_mining_passion==Major)->I just love mining — and my yields are quite high.
mining_veteran(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==undergrounder)->My mining yields are quite high, especially when deep mining.
mining_veteran(priority=-1)->Not to brag but I've achieved very high skill levels in [performing] mining tasks.
mining_green(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==undergrounder)->My mining yields are decent, especially when deep mining.
mining_green(priority=-1)->I have some skills in [performing] mining tasks.
mining_unskilled(INITIATOR_mining_passion==Minor)->I enjoy mining, but I still have a lot to learn.
mining_unskilled(INITIATOR_mining_passion==Major)->I just love mining, but I still have a lot to learn.
mining_unskilled(p=3,INITIATOR_trait==undergrounder)->My mining yields are poor, I admit — but when deep mining I usually perform better.
